text: Marquinhos, full name Marcos Aoás Corrêa (born 1994), Brazilian footballer.. Marquinhos or Marquinho is a diminutive name of Marcos or Marcus, may refer to: == Marquinhos == *Marcos Corrêa dos Santos (born 1971), Brazilian footballer *Marcus Alfredo de Araújo (born 1972), Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born 1976), full name Marcos Gomes de Araujo, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos Paraná (born 1977), full name Antônio Marcos da Silva Filho, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos Caruaru (born 1977), full name Marcos José Franklin Macena de Melo, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born 1981), full name Marcos Vicente dos Santos, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born April 1982), full name Marcos Antônio Malachias Júnior, Brazilian-born Bulgarian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born August 1982), full name Marcos Aurélio Lima Barros, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born October 1982), full name Marcos Roberto da Silva Barbosa, Brazilian footballer *Weimar Marcos Rodrigues (born 1984), Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born June 1989), full name Marco da Silva Ignácio, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born October 1989), full name Marcos Antônio da Silva Gonçalves, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos (footballer, born 1999), full name José Marcos Costa Martins, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos Moraes (born 1991), full name Marcos dos Santos Moraes, Brazilian footballer *Marquinhos Pedroso (born 1993), full name Marcos Garbellotto Pedroso, Brazilian footballer *Marcus Vinicius Vieira de Souza, Brazilian basketball player *Marcos Antônio Abdalla Leite (born 1952), Brazilian basketball player *Marquinhos Gabriel (born 1990), Brazilian footballer who plays for Corinthians. *Marquinhos Santos (born 1979), Brazilian soccer manager *Marquinhos do Sul (born 1994), Brazilian footballer who plays as a winger for Brazilian club Vasco da Gama *Marquinhos Carioca (born 1992), full name Marcus Vinícius Vidal Cunha, Brazilian footballer == Marquinho == *Marco Antônio dos Santos (born 1966), Brazilian footballer *Marquinho (footballer, born 1982), full name Marco Aurélio Pereira Alves, Brazilian footballer *Marquinho (futsal player), (born 1974) Brazilian futsal player *Marcus Vinícius da Cruz Alves Nóbrega (born 1983), Brazilian footballer, known as "Marcus Vinícius" and "Marquinho" *Marquinho (footballer, born 1986), full name Marco Antônio de Mattos title: Marquinhos (disambiguation)
